1.text: And the Spirit expressly speaketh, that in latter times shall certain fall away from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits and teachings of demons,

2.text: in hypocrisy speaking lies, being seared in their own conscience,

3.text: forbidding to marry—to abstain from meats that God created to be received with thanksgiving by those believing and acknowledging the truth,

4.text: because every creature of God is good, and nothing is to be rejected, with thanksgiving being received,

5.text: for it is sanctified through the word of God and intercession.

6.text: These things placing before the brethren, thou shalt be a good ministrant of Jesus Christ, being nourished by the words of the faith, and of the good teaching, which thou didst follow after,

7.text: and the profane and old women’s fables reject thou, and exercise thyself unto piety,

8.text: for the bodily exercise is unto little profit, and the piety is to all things profitable, a promise having of the life that now is, and of that which is coming;

9.text: stedfast is the word, and of all acceptation worthy;

10.text: for for this we both labour and are reproached, because we hope on the living God, who is Saviour of all men—especially of those believing.

12.text: let no one despise thy youth, but a pattern become thou of those believing in word, in behaviour, in love, in spirit, in faith, in purity;

13.text: till I come, give heed to the reading, to the exhortation, to the teaching;

14.text: be not careless of the gift in thee, that was given thee through prophecy, with laying on of the hands of the eldership;

15.text: of these things be careful; in these things be, that thy advancement may be manifest in all things;

16.text: take heed to thyself, and to the teaching; remain in them, for this thing doing, both thyself thou shalt save, and those hearing thee.
